data.title: Tons of fun for all
data.text: I booked the Swamp Tour recently for my daughter's 12 th birthday party. I was unsure how her and hers friends would do. However, we had a great game master and the girls did great. They all had fun and can't wait to go back.

data.title: Fun, Outside of the Box
data.text: Unravel was my first experience with escape games. We went as a group of four and we did the Pandemic room as our first. We escaped with seconds to spare out of our one hour time limit. I must say that the feeling of actually winning at this is extremely rewarding. Your logical thinking, problem solving, and teamwork will be put to the utmost degree. After having a great experience our first time around we went back as a group of five, I lured my friend from out of town to come along. Although we didn't succeed at the second attempt, it was still a blast no less. The staff really gets the anticipation up prior to going into the room. If you are stuck at anytime they will give you hints via a TV that is in the room. All in all this place is a great way to spend an hour and even though you might struggle the fun is there.

data.title: Great time
data.text: We were coming back from vacation in Texas.  Stopped in Lafayette.  Did this last minute for an ending to vacation.  Very accommodating to our last minute plans.  We did swamp and had never done this before.  We got clues along the way but didn't escape. Had a lot of fun trying though.  2 adults, 16year old, 13 year old, and a 10 year old.

data.title: Fun for the family!
data.text: We did DaVinci room and it was very fun but very difficult, apparently the most difficult of the rooms. We had a blast even still, and the hour flew by!  The host was extremely friendly and helpful!  It was slightly expensive in my opinion, $117 for an hour (4 people) but it was definitely a great experience and we will probably do it again!

data.title: Challenging, but fun
data.text: I really liked the flow of this escape room. (DaVinci Room) Steps were creative and challenging with clues given at the right times. The staff was super friendly and really go above and beyond to make sure you enjoy the experience. Can't wait to go back!

data.title: Good time!
data.text: Did the epidemic room and it was really fun.  The room had a high tech vibe that was both interesting and intellectually stimulating.

data.title: Haven't had that much fun in a long time!!!
data.text: I took my 14 year old and her friends for her birthday Saturday morning and we escaped from the Epidemic Room with 6 minutes left! It was so much fun I came back with just adults Saturday night and did the Swamp Tour . The employees/owners are great to deal with and we will be back soon to do Da Vinci !!!

data.title: Escape game
data.text: Friends and I played the epidemic room, it was very challenging and fun. I recommend this game to others. I am excited and ready to play the other rooms available.

data.title: Escape game
data.text: Absolutely amazing, I have played all rooms, and each is as original as intriguing! Nothing scary here, just have to use your critical thinking skills!

data.title: Challenging and fun!
data.text: Great room setup! The staff will provide clues on the in room tv if it looks like you're getting stuck. Highly recommend!

owner_response.author: Jessica C, Owner at Unravel Live Escape Game, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Thank you so much for the positive feedback! We are so glad that you enjoyed your experience at Unravel!
owner_response.title: Owner Response
